comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content:
Some kind of Bastille Day celebration, note the date on this one:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/3739591408/]

comment.author: 93764178@N00
comment._content: As penny says, the date is definitely Bastille Day (July 14) - the girls seem to be playing a blindfold game to win dolls. Never heard of such a game, maybe someone has.

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content:
pennylrichardsca and Stephoto: Thanks for your observations about this image. The date 7/14 probably refers to Bastille Day. A related photograph from the Bain collection shows a similar scene with the caption reading "July 14 fete": hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/cph.3b06690
We will add this information to the description when we upload the database.
